name: Last.fm - prettier
description:
redone by pah borges, borrowing some other styles. I made this css because of my own necessities; feel free to use.

No logo of last.fm
No left column
No library
No footer
No ads [no ads at all]
No images on tracks main page [personal config]


styles borrowed:
http://userstyles.org/styles/10605
http://userstyles.org/styles/4645
http://userstyles.org/styles/9009
